tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlantGenetics (
  plant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  genetic_code TEXT,
  growth_stage INTEGER,
  modification_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
    crop_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_species VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    origin_country VARCHAR(50),
    genetic_information JSON
);

CREATE TABLE candidates_for_modification (
    candidate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_id INT REFERENCES crops(crop_id),
    modification_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    confirmation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE crop_modifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    modification_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (modification_id) REFERENCES genetic_modifications(modification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_family VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_origin VARCHAR(50),
    genetic_code TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_varieties (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    variety_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    variety_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(id)
);

CREATE TABLE modification_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_variety_id INT,
    modification_id INT,
    modification_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_variety_id) REFERENCES crop_varieties(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (modification_id) REFERENCES genetic_modifications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  marker_id INT,
  genotype VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES crop_species(species_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES genetic_markers(marker_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lab_id INT,
  sample_id INT,
  analysis_result VARCHAR(200),
  FOREIGN KEY (lab_id) REFERENCES research_labs(lab_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES crop_samples(sample_id)
);
